about_the_game:
RAT MEMORY is a platformer game about a rat trying to remember his past, discover his present and change his future.

This is a demo that contains one of the dream levels. Thanks for checking it out. Don't forget to see the full game page.

RAT MEMORY is a platformer game with exploration, in which you will have to complete tasks, such as collecting items and coins.

With these coins you can unlock new movements and items for the protagonist.

You can also collect items from another type...

Features:

  • This platformer game has two cycles: at day, explore the place, try to collect coins and other items, and purchase abilities. At night, play the dream levels and try to overcome the platformer and exploration challenges to unlock new buyable abilities.
  • Family-friendly: there is no violence neither bad wording, or dark and mature themes. The only enemies here are the scenario and your gaming skills.
  • Easy to learn: you unlock new movements gradually, and you can try to master them at day levels for the time you want.
  • Unique story and lore: this is only the beginning of a new game universe. Quero Games has plans to expand this world in new games.

About the Demo

RAT MEMORY is a platformer game about a rat trying to remember his past, discover his present and change his future.

This is a demo that contains one of the dream levels. Thanks for checking it out. Don't forget to see the full game page.

RAT MEMORY is a platformer game with exploration, in which you will have to complete tasks, such as collecting items and coins.

With these coins you can unlock new movements and items for the protagonist.

You can also collect items from another type...

Features:

  • This platformer game has two cycles: at day, explore the place, try to collect coins and other items, and purchase abilities. At night, play the dream levels and try to overcome the platformer and exploration challenges to unlock new buyable abilities.
  • Family-friendly: there is no violence neither bad wording, or dark and mature themes. The only enemies here are the scenario and your gaming skills.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Soon
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-8370 / i3 8100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 570/ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Soon. 720p 60fps

short_description: RAT MEMORY is a platformer game with exploration about a rat trying to remember his past, discover his present and change his future. This is a demo that contains one of the dream levels.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish
